shots.subject: 体型圆润的蓝精灵，圆眼睛，短小身材
shots.detail: Animated style, a plump Smurf with big round eyes and a short stubby body, first viewed from a low angle emphasizing its cute silhouette, then dolly in smoothly to focus on its rosy, chubby cheeks and sparkling, gleaming pupils, next gently pull back to reveal a wide shot of a joyful group of Smurfs gathered atop a misty mountain peak, soft ethereal clouds drifting around them, gentle wind rustling through the air and children’s cheerful laughter echoing in the background. Camera: dolly in, then slow pull-back. Background sound: light breeze and joyful children’s laughter. Voiceover says in Chinese "从前有座山，山上有一群蓝精灵"
shots.image_detail: (动画风格) 青蓝色皮肤的圆润小精灵，环绕在山顶的云雾间，镜头聚焦在它圆鼓鼓的脸蛋和闪闪发亮的瞳孔
shots.narration: 从前有座山，山上有一群蓝精灵

shots.subject: 蓝精灵们在山巅玩耍
shots.detail: Animated style, a group of small blue-skinned Smurfs playing joyfully on a mountain peak: first they leap playfully one by one, then dart swiftly between treetops like shimmering sparks, finally gathering together atop the mist-shrouded summit, surrounded by drifting clouds and twinkling stars; background features a vast sea of clouds and floating whimsical mushrooms, soft golden-hour light with gentle volumetric glow; camera orbits smoothly around the scene in a full 360-degree cinematic loop; background sound: cheerful laughter and delicate jingling bells. Voiceover says in Chinese "他们每天在山上快乐地玩耍".
shots.image_detail: (动画风格) 一群青蓝色皮肤的小精灵在山巅树梢间跳跃，背景是漫天云海和漂浮的蘑菇
shots.narration: 他们每天在山上快乐地玩耍

shots.subject: 蓝精灵们发现神秘洞穴
shots.detail: Animated style, a group of Smurfs on a mountain peak discovering a glowing cave entrance covered in bioluminescent moss and glowing mushrooms; first they notice the soft fluorescent glow of the moss, then curiously approach the cave entrance with wide-eyed wonder and gentle steps, next they huddle together at the threshold exchanging glances, and finally step inside together as light flickers across their faces; misty, ethereal mountain twilight atmosphere with soft volumetric lighting and subtle magical shimmer; horizontal dolly shot moving smoothly left to right along the cave face; background sound: echoing whispers and mysterious ambient hum. Voiceover says in Chinese "有一天，他们发现了一个神秘的洞穴"
shots.image_detail: (动画风格) 一群小精灵在山巅发现一个发光的洞穴，洞口有荧光苔藓和发光蘑菇
shots.narration: 有一天，他们发现了一个神秘的洞穴

shots.subject: 洞穴内部的奇幻景象
shots.detail: Animated fantasy style, inside a mystical cave glowing with bioluminescent crystals embedded in the walls, floating luminous orbs drifting gently through the air, tiny fairies exploring curiously among glowing fluorescent moss on the floor and ancient glowing runes carved into the stone walls; first revealing the shimmering crystals, then the light orbs rising and swirling slowly, next the fairies fluttering and interacting with the environment, finally widening slightly to reveal the full enchanted cavern — Dolly in smoothly; background sound: echoing whispers and soft ambient cave reverberation. Voiceover says in Chinese "洞穴里藏着无数奇幻的景象"
shots.image_detail: (动画风格) 洞穴内部有发光水晶和漂浮的光球，地面覆盖着荧光苔藓，墙壁上刻有古老符文
shots.narration: 洞穴里藏着无数奇幻的景象

shots.subject: 蓝精灵们在洞穴中发现宝物
shots.detail: Animated fantasy style, blue Smurfs discovering a glowing gemstone inside a mystical cave, first gathered curiously around the radiant gem, then weaving glowing vines around it, next the gem pulsing with increasing light, finally erupting in a dazzling, ethereal glow that illuminates the surrounding crystal clusters and bioluminescent vines; dim ambient cave lighting with dynamic gemlight reflections, soft volumetric glow, intricate magical details; Dolly in smoothly toward the gem as it intensifies; Background sound: delicate crystalline chimes and resonant gem hum. Voiceover says in Chinese "他们发现了传说中的发光宝石"
shots.image_detail: (动画风格) 小精灵们在洞穴中发现一颗发光的宝石，周围有发光的藤蔓和水晶簇
shots.narration: 他们发现了传说中的发光宝石

shots.subject: 蓝精灵们带着宝石返回山巅
shots.detail: Animated style, warm and heartwarming scene: Blue Smurfs flying gracefully through the sky carrying glowing gems on their backs, surrounded by floating light orbs and bioluminescent mushrooms; then they descend smoothly onto the mountain peak; finally, the gems emit a soft, radiant, golden glow that bathes the entire mountaintop in gentle light. Soft wind rustling through alpine grasses and distant joyful laughter fill the air. Horizontal pan shot. Background sound: gentle wind and cheerful laughter. Voiceover says in Chinese "他们带着宝石回到山巅"
shots.image_detail: (动画风格) 小精灵们在山巅上空飞行，背着发光的宝石，周围有漂浮的光球和发光的蘑菇
shots.narration: 他们带着宝石回到山巅
